page.title: 13LAND SURROUNDING HOLT.
page.content: MOST OF THE LAND SURROUNDING HOLT IS CULTIVATED FARMLAND.MANY DIFFERENT CROPS ARE GROWN IN THE FIELDS.HOLT IS MOST FAMOUS FOR ITS CROP OF {STRAWBERRIES}ANNUALLY.HOLT IS NOT RENOUNED FOR ITS CEREAL CROPS.THERE IS NOT ALOT OF DEMAND FOR HAY AS VERY FEW FARMERS HAVE ANIMALS.MOST OF THE FARMERS ARE MARKET GARDENERS WHO SELL THEIR PRODUCE TO CUSTOMERS IN{WREXHAM AND{CHESTER}CENTRES ALTHOUGH SOME MAY GO FURTHER AFIELD. ONLY APPROXIMATELY 20% OF THE LAND AROUND HOLT IS RESIDENTIAL. {STRAWBERRIES}- DURING THE SUMMER SEASON HOLT PRODUCES A MAJOR CROP OF STRAWBERRIES.THE BULK OF THE CROP WHEN RIPE IS PICKED AND TAKEN TO TRADERS BUT THE REMAINDER IS SOLD TO THE PUBLIC.VISITORS FLOCK FROM ALL AREAS TO EITHER PICK THIER OWN OR BUY THEM
